masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote:
"Tanker truck overturned on the downtown off-ramp. It was carrying 5,000 gallons of commercial eggnog. The stuff is EVERYWHEREâ€”streets are like an ice rink but stickier. Cars are sliding into each other. Also it smells like a very aggressive Christmas and people are slipping."

Requirements

  • Stop traffic before more cars slide into the pileup
  • Help stranded drivers get to safety
  • Find a way to clean up 5,000 gallons of eggnog
